panelText.text: Emma leaves work early to show Sandy the property. She asks her colleague, Inna, to take her calls, and doesn’t tell her manager she is leaving early.
Emma’s manager stops by to ask her a question and notices that she isn’t at her desk, and sees printouts of property listings on her desk.
One of Emma’s colleagues complains to the manager that Emma isn’t taking her fair share of calls and that people are often stopping by Emma’s desk to look at pictures on her computer.
When Emma returns to work the next day, her manager appears irritated and calls her into his office to ask for an explanation.

instructionText.text: Select Next to reconsider your decision and try again.
